data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rippel, Mellis Layra Soares, Novaes, Marcos Carneiro, Krolow, Tiago Kütter (2019): First records of the genus Anacroneuria (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Tocantins State, Brazil and description of a new species. Zootaxa 4560 (2): 355-364, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4560.2.8|65 occurrences
